name: Espresso
type: Espresso is a coffee-brewing method of Italian origin, in which a small amount of nearly boiling water is forced under 9–10 bars of pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
type: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam.

name: Latte
type: Caffè latte, often shortened to just latte in English, is a coffee drink of Italian origin made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Americano
type: Caffè Americano is a type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water.

name: Caffè mocha
type: A caffè mocha, also called mocaccino, is a chocolate-flavoured warm beverage that is a variant of a caffè latte

name: Flat white
type: A flat white is a coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam. It is comparable to a latte, but smaller in volume and with less microfoam
